programme.title: Roadkill's Junkyard Gold
programme.sub-title: More Fight for Survival in Vancouver, Washington
programme.desc: All American Classics, a popular salvage yard in Vancouver, Wash., has been forced to downsize due to city expansion and rising taxes; that doesn't stop Steve Magnante from finding what he's looking for in this classic auto salvage yard.

programme.title: Roadkill's Junkyard Gold
programme.sub-title: More Awesome Finds in Denton, Texas
programme.desc: In Denton, Texas, Steve Magnate ends up hooking an AMC Marlin, finding a factory-built V-8 Vega, digging around in an ex-law enforcement Plymouth sedan the Blues Brothers would love and uncovering a super-rare, dual-quad four-door Buick.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: Paul decides to take one of his prized 1959s and go full lowrider with hydraulics and a full custom lowrider paint job; Shorty's wife Lupe has a 1992 Mustang GT 5.0, and Shorty has a honey do list to get this car back to its original glory.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: Discovering how a wet system stacks up against a dry system in an EFI manifold.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.sub-title: Carb v. EFI: The Multipoint Edition
programme.desc: Multipoint EFI gets its turn against the venerable Dominator; it's injectors versus jets, dry flow versus wet, and drivability versus horsepower.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek teams up with Dave Chappelle to revitalize a 1972 Jeep J2000 that's sat among a field of neglected Jeeps; together, they cobble together parts from various Jeeps to get theirs running and attempt to make the 100-mile journey to Derek's shop.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.sub-title: Two Legends Become One: Pigpen Lives!
programme.desc: For years, Pigpen, the junkyard rescued 1950 GMC truck, has sat dormant; the guys awaken a monster by donating the chassis of their own legendary 1985 S-15 in a body swap for the ages, then take on Randy Pobst at Atlanta Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.sub-title: The Magic of the Flex Fuel Sensor
programme.desc: The ability to run a blend of gas and E85 is a game changer; credit the flex fuel sensor, which samples fuel composition and adjusts fuel flow, making more power as more E85 is mixed in.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: Do boost leaks really even matter? Can vacuum leaks make more power? You read those questions right. Come be surprised right along with us as we find power in unexpected places, and lose less than we'd expect in others.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: In the snowy landscape of Michigan's Northern Peninsula, Derek finds a 1964 Ford Galaxie that's sat abandoned for 32 years; he plans to not only get this Ford running, but also to turn it into a rally-tribute car.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys try their hand at no-prep drag racing against Lyle Barnett and his turbocharged 1,500-hp Beer Money Mustang.

programme.title: Speed Is the New Black
programme.desc: With new demands from their client, Classic Car Studios fights to finish their 1971 Chevelle reinvention from classic muscle to modern day super car.

programme.title: Runs Good
programme.desc: Dan and Shea drive out to Clovis, New Mexico, to buy the holy grail of JDM imports, a Toyota AE86; nostalgia aside, Aaron is skeptical whether it was a good buy, or even roadworthy.

programme.title: Head 2 Head
programme.sub-title: 2019 Alfa Romeo Giulia Quadrifoglio vs 2019 Jaguar Project 8
programme.desc: Iconic cars go against one another in a battle for bragging rights.

programme.title: Head 2 Head Drag Race
programme.desc: Jeff and Jonny can't decide which supertruck is best, or even what the definition of supertruck is; they debate whether it's about how it looks, sounds or drives, horsepower/torque, whether it can be electric, and whether it can even do truck things.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Some cars carry powerful myths with them long after they are gone; these are stories of cars whose intriguing legends have endured long past the metal they are made from.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: The quest for speed has been ingrained in humans since the birth of the wheel; these are stories of people who gathered like-minded speed freaks and created outlaw cultures of pushing the limits of public roads.

programme.title: Roadkill's Junkyard Gold
programme.sub-title: More Fight for Survival in Vancouver, Washington
programme.desc: All American Classics, a popular salvage yard in Vancouver, Wash., has been forced to downsize due to city expansion and rising taxes; that doesn't stop Steve Magnante from finding what he's looking for in this classic auto salvage yard.

programme.title: Engine Masters

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: Do boost leaks really even matter? Can vacuum leaks make more power? You read those questions right. Come be surprised right along with us as we find power in unexpected places, and lose less than we'd expect in others.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Facing deadline, the shop struggles to fit a gigantic ex-NFL player into a tiny 1967 Chevy C10 that includes a customized leather interior and automated bed cover.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Ekstensive turns a stock 2020 Denali dually into a frame-dropping, show-stopping work truck; as a final touch, Bill handmakes articulating speakers for the bed; Bill takes a family's minds off their brush with a custom 2019 Polaris Ranger.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.sub-title: Geraldo's Beat Up Pickup & a Pro Player's Dream Ride
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Geraldo Rivera brings his 2004 Toyota Tacoma to Team Unique for some much-needed work.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: All the Concept Corvette's elements are built and assembled, but Dave needs to find a buyer; a rock 'n' roll icon brings his '34 Ford coupe to the shop.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.sub-title: Just a Couple Heres and Theres
programme.desc: A simple repaint of a 1964 Corvette careens into much more after Dave upsells the client on a couple of design features, and the crew finds some damage underneath the original paint; the owner of an iconic Ford GTX1 tasks Dave with solving a dilemma.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: A customer wants to surprise his wife with major upgrades to her '68 Corvette convertible, but working with the fiberglass body soon brings on headaches that threaten both the car and the shop to crack under the pressure.

programme.title: Texas Metal's Loud and Lifted
programme.desc: A request about a 1947 Ford truck becomes 1 Way Diesel Performance's next ground-up build; Mod Mafia jumps into uncharted territory with a Viper ACRX race car.
